text: We have found that it is phosphorylated , predominantly on serine residues , when transiently overexpressed in 293 cells .

text: The phosphorylation appears to be related to the signaling events that are activated by <extra_id_0> TRAF2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> under these circumstances , since two nonfunctional mutants were found to be phosphorylated significantly less than the wild-type protein .

Furthermore , the phosphorylation status of <extra_id_0> TRAF2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> had significant effects on the ability of the protein to bind to <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , as evidenced by our observations that the <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> cytoplasmic domain interacted preferentially with underphosphorylated <extra_id_0> TRAF2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and that phosphatase treatment significantly enhanced the binding of <extra_id_0> TRAF2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> to <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
